segments.text: I really need to find a parking spot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you looking for a space on or off campus ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know any spaces on campus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can park in the student parking structure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll find the parking structure on the west side of the campus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any idea if the parking structure has any spaces left ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Last time I checked , it was pretty empty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time was it when you went up there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It wouldn't be full right now , would it ?
segments.speaker: S1
